about_the_game:
Available in English only. Grab the EARTHLOCK Origins Comic Book: The Clay Orchid & The Stormdog. The first comic book in the EARTHLOCK universe which gives you a unique and personal look into the backstories of Amon and Ive.

The comic book can be accessed by selecting the new title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.
detailed_description:
Available in English only. Grab the EARTHLOCK Origins Comic Book: The Clay Orchid & The Stormdog. The first comic book in the EARTHLOCK universe which gives you a unique and personal look into the backstories of Amon and Ive.

The comic book can be accessed by selecting the new title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 1GB of memory
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 2GB of memory

name: EARTHLOCK Origins Comic Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 GPU with 1GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU with 2GB of memory
